title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4028 - Qualifications Of Starters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4028 - Qualifications Of Starters

State Regulations
§ 4028.1 - Qualifications to start
§ 4028.2 - Change of jockey
§ 4028.3 - Horses to be saddled in paddock
§ 4028.4 - Duties of paddock judge
§ 4028.5 - Horse in paddock not to be touched
§ 4028.6 - Inspection of plating, bandaging
§ 4028.7 - Withdrawal of horse
§ 4028.8 - Time of race to be printed
§ 4028.9 - Post time

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4028

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1982, ch. 865, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
